cab.content: Operations *From :- G.O.C., G.H.Q. Mesopotamia.To C. in C. India, repeated C.I.G.S. ?'ar Office.28.9.17.X.5862. 4.10 p.m. Sept. 28th.As Turkish communiques are so consistently fictitious I do not propose to contradict them regularly.Latest instance is that of September 26th, announcing complete annihilation of our cavalry detachment on Euphrates. True story is that three of our horses were wounded in brush between cavalry patrols.
